title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 8800.6 - Additional information
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 8800.6 - Additional information

State Regulations

After the office has received a petition for an advisory
opinion, any party that submits any additional information to the office shall, at the same time, send copies of such information to all other parties and
shall state in its submission to the office that it has done so. Any person
other than a party may also submit additional information to the office. Any
person other than a party who submits information to the office should, at the
time of submission to the office, also send copies of such information to all
parties to the petition and state in its submission to the office that it has
done so. Additional information may be submitted to the office within 30 days
of the date of the office's receipt of the complete petition. All parties shall
have 10 days from the office's receipt of the additional information to submit
a response to the additional information to the office. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
8800.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
